name: Hana
heading: NPC-HANA: Hana (Mentor)
desc: Mid-30s woman, sage green traveler's clothes, satchel, hair tied back.

name: Artun
heading: NPC-ARTUN: Artun (Village Elder)
desc: Elderly man, tall and thin. Dark warm brown coat, walking stick, white hair.

name: Grym
heading: NPC-GRYM: Grym / The Curator (Antagonist)
desc: Tall, elegant. Crystalline near-white robes, high collar, hands clasped.
title: The Curator

name: Khali
heading: NPC-KHALI: Khali (Shopkeeper)
desc: Round, cheerful. Warm rust red apron, short curly chestnut hair.

name: Hark
heading: NPC-HARK: Hark (Blacksmith)
desc: Broad, muscular. Dark leather apron, thick arms, dark hair, hammer at belt.

name: Nyro
heading: NPC-NYRO: Nyro (Innkeeper)
desc: Stocky, warm smile. White apron over brown tunic, ruddy cheeks, rolled sleeves.

name: Nel
heading: NPC-NEL: Nel (Ridge Guide)
desc: Weathered, lean. Gray-brown cloak, climbing rope coiled at hip, wind-tanned skin.

name: Janik
heading: NPC-JANIK: Janik (Sunridge Keeper)
desc: Young man, pale gold hair, sun-bleached tunic, carries a brass telescope.

name: Julz
heading: NPC-JULZ: Julz (Flickerveil Warden)
desc: Tall woman, silver-streaked dark hair, deep violet cloak with luminous stitching.

name: Reza
heading: NPC-REZA: Reza (Flickerveil Elder)
desc: Elderly, hunched. Faded indigo robes, long white beard, lantern staff.

name: Vash
heading: NPC-VASH: Vash (Marsh Researcher)
desc: Wiry, nervous energy. Mud-stained green coat, goggles pushed up on forehead, many pouches.

name: Meza
heading: NPC-MEZA: Meza (Audiomancer of Ambergrove)
desc: Senior audiomancer. Maintains the sound-wells. Practical, grounded, deep knowledge of resonance.

name: Seza
heading: NPC-SEZA: Seza (Healer of Thornveil)
desc: Elderly herbalist and healer. Patient, deep knowledge of stagnation sickness and remedies.

name: Serek
heading: NPC-SEREK: Serek (Preserver Lieutenant)
desc: Preserver field commander. Pragmatic enforcer. Can become ally depending on player choices.
